body.name: Healing Potions
body.body: Drinking a healing potion for yourself is a bonus action. Giving a potion to someone within 5 feet of you is an action. Every other potion is an action as normal.

body.name: Throwing Potions
body.body: Throwing a potion is treated as a ranged weapon attack with a range of 15/30. Alternatively, potions can be shot tied onto arrows or crossbow bolts to use the range of the weapon. On impact, potions apply their intended effects, even if they are normally ingested.
